page.title: 11Leisure Activities in Lavant
page.content: In Lavant there are about 26 clubs.We asked some people about the clubs they go to.The Guide we asked told us about some of the things she does.These are Tracking,Nature Walks and Cookouts. Crossways is another club with the age group of 10 _ 15 run by the Rector.The activities they do are fun games,fancy dress and swimming 2 or 3 times a term.We asked one of our teachers(Mr.Arnold) about the P.T.A.he said they had meetings arranging fund raising and social activities.Here is a list of some of the other clubs:_ Brownies,music-hall, keepfit, C.B.club, mother and toddler, 2 W.I.'s, playgroup, Recorder Band, football club, karate and some after school activities like athletics, guitars, piano and recorders.
